content:
In the Refusal of the Call section of a documentary series, you can focus on the moments of self-doubt and fear that Kadence experiences as he hesitates to pursue his dreams. This could include:

1. Introspective moments where Kadence reflects on his fears and the reasons why he is hesitant to take the leap.
2. Conversations with friends, family, or mentors who offer advice and guidance.
3. Moments of frustration or disappointment as Kadence struggles with the decision of whether to pursue his dreams or not.
4. Inspiring moments where Kadence overcomes his fears and decides to take action, showing his strength and determination.
5. The creation of new music as Kadence embraces his passion and takes the first steps towards his dreams.
6. Showcasing the ups and downs of the creative process, from writer's block to breakthrough moments.
7. Behind-the-scenes moments of Kadence performing live, recording in the studio, or collaborating with other musicians.
8. Personal moments that highlight the sacrifices and challenges Kadence faces as he balances his passion for music with his day-to-day life.

These scenes will give viewers an intimate look at the process of overcoming fears and pursuing dreams, and will allow them to connect with Kadence and his journey.
